body_html:
I think @yaroslavvb's post was a typo – NCHW is cuDNN's native format, and is what most other DL libraries use. As such the justification is perhaps that the built-in NHWC operations in cuDNN are slower than transpose-run-transpose.

The CPU implementations in TF largely do only support NHWC, and will fail otherwise.

The CPU implementations in TF largely do only support NHWC, and will fail otherwise.
body:
I think @yaroslavvb's post was a typo – NCHW is cuDNN's native format, and is what most other DL libraries use. As such the justification is perhaps that the built-in NHWC operations in cuDNN are slower than transpose-run-transpose.

The CPU implementations in TF largely do only support NHWC, and will fail otherwise.
